# Python bytecode files
*.pyc
*.pyo
__pycache__

# Virtual environment folder
.venv/
env/
venv/

# Flask-specific files
instance/
*.db
*.sqlite

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE/editor-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Log files
*.log

# Coverage reports
.coverage
*.cover

# Temporary files
*.bak
*.swp

# Render-specific
render.yaml
